input.sentences: i was prepared for the 10k run .
i quickly went to registration and signed in ...
and | walked outside and received my number .
and | we were off to the races .
output.sentences: Jim was fairly nervous about the charity race.
He had not expected so many people to show up for it.
Luckily everyone was super friendly and nice to him.
He and many others began to race and did very well.
Jim was very excited to see the finish line and the crowd cheering for him.
